meanings.definition: A brief record of something written down to assist the memory or for future reference.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a note of important dates in my planner.
meanings.sent2: She jotted down a note to remember the grocery items.
meanings.sent3: The note about the cat wearing a hat made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a musical note in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The note of excitement in his voice was contagious.

meanings.definition: A single tone of definite pitch made by a musical instrument or the human voice.
meanings.sent1: The piano produced a beautiful note that echoed in the room.
meanings.sent2: His singing voice hit the high notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The note from the trumpet startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: Her words carried a note of sadness that touched everyone.
meanings.sent5: The note of the flute floated through the air like a gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A written or printed communication or record.
meanings.sent1: She received a note from her friend inviting her to the party.
meanings.sent2: He left a note on the fridge reminding them to buy milk.
meanings.sent3: The note from the boss was unexpected but positive.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held a note of concern as he read the letter.
meanings.sent5: The note left on the desk revealed a secret message.
